subject: Discrimination
Suits and Litigation (Civil)
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: A former Tennessee associate director of sports medicine and two former strength coaches settled a gender discrimination and retaliation lawsuit they filed against the university in 2012 for $750,000 and attorneys’ fees.
snippet: A former Tennessee associate director of sports medicine and two former strength coaches settled a gender discrimination and retaliation lawsuit they filed against the university in 2012 for $750,000 and attorneys’ fees.
